markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs=""
>
[Potion of Swimming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=193)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 563 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This potion tastes like salt water, and sandy grit settles to the bottom of its container. When you drink it, you gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed for 10 minutes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Potion of Swimming
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 563 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Potion of Swimming (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 563 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The swim Speed lasts for 1 hour.
name: Potion of Swimming (Greater)
